name: Autum Cleaning
description:
Hurry up and grab the leaf blower so you can be the first one to clean up your room. Blow into your microphone to blow away the leaves. But be careful, your enemy will throw acorns at you to get to the leaf blower himself. Who will manage to have less leaves in his room in the end? Controls
Player 1 move: WASD
Player 1 use: Spacebar
Player 2 move: Arrowkeys
Player 2 use: Enter Microphone only works in download version. The web version can be played with a keyboard! A Game made by
Bianca Rühr Levy (Art),
Clara Müller (Art),
David Vath (Programming), and
Lukas Hort (Programming)
in cooperation with HAW Hamburg.
